message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $16,000. I know it's worth $15,000 to you, but I believe it's a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,250.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product for both of us.  Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $13,000?
